Title: Camp X-Ray
Actors: Nawal Bengholam, Payman Maadi, Lane Garrison, Joseph Julian Soria
Plot: A young soldier escapes her suffocating small town by joining the military, only to find that she isn't going for a tour of duty in Iraq as she hoped. Instead, she's sent to Guantanamo. Met with hatred and abuse from the men in her charge, she forges an odd friendship with a young man who has been imprisoned at Gitmo for eight years.
